DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate safety efficacy artemether-lumefantrine uncomplicated malaria cause P. falciparum child 5-35 kg bodyweight .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Safety Pediatric Formulation Artemether- Lumefantrine Children With Uncomplicated P. Falciparum Malaria .
DOC.criteria: male female infant child ≤12 year age body weight ≥5 kg < 35 kg , confirm diagnosis uncomplicated malaria cause P. falciparum parasite complicate malaria persistent vomit malaria due parasite P. falciparum antimalarial treatment receive past 2 week know chronic disease e.g . positive HIV status , severe cardiac , renal , hepatic disease
